# [Interview #1088: WoR Signing Report - Argent, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1088#25)

#### Question

The gemstone Gavilar gives to Szeth, is that the gemstone that's spoke of in the epigraphs?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
